title: 4-year-old boy killed in north side Milwaukee shooting
content:
Autoplay:4-year-old boy killed in north side Milwaukee shootingCONNECTING...
MILWAUKEE -- A 4-year-old boy was killed in a shooting on Milwaukee's north side Friday evening, police say.
It happened just before 6:00 p.m. in the 2100 block of N. 15th St. Police say the boy was shot inside a home by a gun fired inside the same home.
The circumstances leading up to the shooting and any potential suspects are still being investigated. An autopsy for the boy has been scheduled for Saturday, according to the Milwaukee County Medical Examiner's Office.
This story is developing - check back often for updates as we get them.
